children.name: B Paraskevopoulos
children.desc: Catering Director/Manager of Laurel Sea Transport

children.name: Effie Coulouthros
children.desc: According to IHS, E Coulouthros is the Chairman of Laurel Sea Transport

children.name: Effie Coulouthros Paraskevopoulos
children.desc: This version of Effie's name appears on the Panamanian company registry.

children.name: Atlantica Compania Comercial
children.desc: The Panamanian company has multiple links to the Colouthros family. While Effie is the Treasurer and Secretary of the company, her father is the President.
